text: you so hv ban chhlaey tha min troemte bonnaohte saumbite mhoubaeahar delke yk mk aoy anak teangpir ka khnhom ach brab pi braphet robsa vea ban der mounnung vea mokadl anak teangpir . noh haey chea avei del mcheasa robsakhnhom ban bangrien khnhom . pitabrakd nasa khnhom ban chiesa chhngay pi sasanea robsa krom del kmean chomnue leu a l laoh daoy puok ke bdeseth nung thngai barlok
